TopicTitle: Totally serious airplane simulation with KSP

Articles.Content:
A friend passed me this video about this new "G-2" supercomputer that China made, which is now the fastest one in the world.

The video is in Spanish, but I'll translate the important part that begins in 0:55

http://www.antena3.com/noticias/tecnologia/china-crea-via-lactea-ordenador-mas-rapido-mundo_2013062100018.html

Translation from 0:55 : "...and not only design commercial airplanes but simulate their operation as if they were real for making them more secure and efficient"

I hope that clip was put by the news and not by the chinese.
It was put in by the news agency and the clip is actually from Scott Manley
Not the first time KSP has shown up in the news.
